title: Chip
description: A chip component for displaying tags, labels, and categories.

overview.title: Overview
overview.description: Chips are small, compact elements used to represent tags, categories, status, etc.

type.title: Types
type.description: Chip provides three types: default (dark background), fill (light background), border (border only).

size.title: Sizes
size.description: Chip supports sm (small) and md (default) sizes.

icon.title: Icons
icon.description: You can add icons to chips to provide visual information.

round.title: Rounded Corners
round.description: You can add the round class to create fully rounded corners.

delete.title: Delete Button
delete.description: You can add a delete button to chips to provide removal functionality.

react.title: React Component
react.description: You can use the Chip component in React.

props.title: Props
props.children: Content to display in the chip
props.type: Style type of the chip (default, fill, border)
props.round: Whether to apply fully rounded corners
props.icon: Icon class name to display in the chip
props.onDelete: Function called when delete button is clicked
